page.title: 08THE YOUNG IN BISHOPS LYDEARD
page.content: There are 2 Cub Scout Packs,a Scout Troop,a mixed Venture Unit and a Girl Guide Company who meet in what must be one of the most suitable and attractive purpose built Headquarters in the country.There is a Brownie Pack which at the moment meets in the School hall but is shortly to join the other groups.The whole Group is most active with events, hikes,camps etc. most weekends of the year. The Village Hall is the venue for the well established Playgroup and the Mother and Toddler Group.The number of young children in the village has increased to the point that even though there are 8 half-day sessions each week there is still a waiting list of children to join. Continued on Page 7.
